Package com.nitay.couponproject.dal.interfaces

Interface CouponsDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
CouponsDBDAO
public interface CouponsDAO
An interface for coupons data access object

  • Method Details

    • addCoupon

      long addCoupon​(Coupon coupon) throws CrudException
      Adds a new coupon to the database
      Parameters:
      coupon - A Coupon object (no Id required)
      Returns:
      Auto generated coupon ID
      Throws:
      CrudException - if something gets wrong.
      See Also:
      Coupon, CrudException

    • updateCoupon

      void updateCoupon​(Coupon coupon) throws CrudException
      Updates an existing coupon in the database
      Parameters:
      coupon - A full Coupon object (Id param is required)
      Throws:
      CrudException - if something gets wrong.
      See Also:
      Coupon, CrudException

    • deleteCoupon

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      CrudException - if something gets wrong.
      See Also:
      CrudException

    • addCouponPurchase

      long addCouponPurchase​(long customerId, long couponId) throws CrudException
      Add a one coupon purchase by one customer
      Parameters:
      customerId - The customer id (must exist in the database)
      couponId - The coupon id (must exist in the database)
      Returns:
      The Coupon id
      Throws:
      CrudException - if something gets wrong
      See Also:

      ArrayList of all company's coupons

    • getCompanyCoupons

      java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getCompanyCoupons​(long companyId, Category category) throws CrudException
      Gets all the given company's coupons filtered by given category
      Parameters:
      companyId - The company id in the database
      category - A Category (enum) refers the category column in the database
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all company's coupons filtered by category
      Throws:
      CrudException

    • getCompanyCoupons

      java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getCompanyCoupons​(long companyId, double maxPrice) throws CrudException
      Gets all coupons of the given company up to the given maximum price
      Parameters:
      companyId - The company id in the database
      maxPrice - Maximum price to filter the result
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all company's coupons up to maxPrice
      Throws:
      CrudException - if something gets wrong

    • getCustomerCoupons

      java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getCustomerCoupons​(long customerId) throws CrudException
      Gets all given customer's coupons
      Parameters:
      customerId - The customer id in the database
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of all given customer's coupons
      Throws:
      CrudException - if something gets wrong.

      Coupon, CrudException

    • getCustomerCoupons

      Parameters:
      customerId - The customer id in the database

      Returns:
      ArrayList of all customer's coupons filtered by category
      Throws:
      CrudException

    • getCustomerCoupons

      java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getCustomerCoupons​(long customerId, double maxPrice) throws CrudException
      Gets all coupons of the given customer up to the given maximum price
      Parameters:
      customerId - The customer id in the database
      maxPrice - Maximum price to filter the result
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all customer's coupons up to maxPrice
      Throws:
      CrudException - if something gets wrong.
